author: ekoneil
msg: Switch the data grid tests off of using a .jsp include with scriptlet to using a Control to load the XMLBean that contains portfolio test data.

author: crossley
msg: Add a message to explain the default skins and the test remote skins.
The default skin names are hard-coded. We need to find a way to automate that.

author: ekoneil
msg: Decouple the data grid from PageContext and move it onto JspContext.  The PageContext is stil used internally to do URL and action creation, but the APIs just expose JspContext.
